ygData.subject: Dual, Wield, at, Level, 13!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Something changed on the last patch. Had another warrior stop me to tell me that dual wield is now trainable at level 13!!  Woohoo – went to the trainer in
ygData.messageBody:
Something changed on the last patch.

Had another warrior stop me to tell me that dual wield is now trainable at
level 13!! Woohoo � went to the trainer in Freeport and now I am dealing
death with my combine lsword in one hand and a FS lsword in the other. This
is a great skill!!!! I was farting around trying to increase my skill by
using a rusty 2h sword. This is so much better!! Can't wait until I make
level 15 and get double strike.

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
